metadata.dc:author: Blundo, O A
Irazu, J C
Katz, O N
Salas, J
Echeguren, E S
de Miceu, S
metadata.dc:description: We report 12 cases of Fournier's Gangrene treated over an 19-month period; at Division Urology of the Hospital Gral. de Agudos Dr. José M. Ramos Mejia. We emphatized 58.3% of the patients had an urology origin. We considered diagnostic and therapeutic issues, and bibliografic review.
metadata.dc:title: Gangrena de Fournier. Nuestra experiencia clínica, etiopatogenia y tratamiento.
[Fournier's gangrene. Our clinical experience, etiopathogenesis and management].
